Severe CKD (Pa02<60mmHg) entitles the patient to exemption from co-payment under ALD 14.

properties.question: Under which condition is a patient with Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) entitled to exemption from co-payment according to ALD 14?
properties.option_a: When the patient's creatinine clearance is above 90 mL/min
properties.option_b: When the patient is undergoing dialysis treatment
properties.option_c: When the patient's Pa02 level is below 60 mmHg
properties.option_d: When the patient has a urine albumin-to-creatinine ratio above 30 mg/g
